channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: First
item.description: python方式 批量导出，运行后所有tar包都在当前目录下 # encoding: utf-8 import re import os import subprocess if __name__ == "__main__": p = subprocess.Popen('docker images', shell=True, stdout=subprocess.PIPE, stderr=subprocess.STDOUT) for line in p.stdout.readlines(): # 此处的正则表达式是为了匹配镜像名以kolla为开头的镜像 # 实际使用中根据需要自行调整 m = re.match(r'(^kolla[^\s]*\s*)\s([^\s]*\s)', line) if not m: continue # 镜像名 iname = m.group(1).strip() # tag itag = m.group(2).strip() # tar包的名字 if iname.find('/'): tarname = iname.
